org.openscience.cdk.interfaces
Interface IAtomParity

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AtomParity, DebugAtomParity, NNAtomParity
public interface IAtomParity
extends java.lang.Cloneable

Represents the concept of an atom parity identifying the stereochemistry around an atom, given four neighbouring atoms.

Author:
egonw
Keywords:
atom parity, stereochemistry
Created on:
2005-08-24
Belongs to CDK module:
interfaces
Source code:
HEAD

Method Summary
 IAtom getAtom()
          Returns the atom for which this parity is defined.
 int getParity()
          Returns the parity value.
 IAtom[] getSurroundingAtoms()
          Returns the four atoms that define the stereochemistry for this parity.
